articles.author: Matt Egan
articles.title: Fitch warns it could still downgrade America’s credit rating despite debt ceiling resolution - CNN
articles.description: Fitch Ratings is keeping the United States on watch for a potential credit rating downgrade even after Congress passed a last-minute bill to avert a disastrous default.
articles.content:
Fitch Ratings is keeping the United States on watch for a potential credit rating downgrade even after Congress passed a last-minute bill to avert a disastrous default.

articles.title: National Donut Day: The surprising history behind the US tradition - BBC
articles.description: America's love affair with donuts traces back to the battlefields of France in World War One.
articles.content:
Soft and sugary, it has spurred the spirits of World War One soldiers on the front lines.
Warm and doughy, it has earned the adulation of Homer Simpson, the main character of America's longest-runni… [+2164 chars]
